name: Molly Maxwell
text:
Dexter Drake deck only. Replacement.
[free] Exhaust Molly Maxwell and deal her 1 horror: Name any trait. One at a time, reveal cards from the top of your deck until an asset with the named trait is revealed. Draw that asset. Shuffle each other revealed card back into your deck.
real_text:
Dexter Drake deck only. Replacement.
[free] Exhaust Molly Maxwell and deal her 1 horror: Name any trait. One at a time, reveal cards from the top of your deck until an asset with the named trait is revealed. Draw that asset. Shuffle each other revealed card back into your deck.

name: Yaztaroth
text: Dexter Drake deck only. Replacement. Revelation - Put Yaztaroth into play in your threat area. You cannot play assets or put assests into play. [action] [action]: Discard Yaztaroth.
